titles.title: Saving Over Spending Act
Saving Over Spending Act

To curb wasteful spending by making 50 percent of year-end savings in salaries and expenses available for an additional fiscal year, and to use the remaining 50 percent for the purpose of deficit reduction.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Saving Over Spending Act - Allows 50% of any unobligated balance of an appropriated amount available for salaries and expenses that would otherwise expire at the end of a fiscal year to remain available for expenditure for the subsequent fiscal year and allocates the other 50% for deficit reduction.
